objectives.name: Primary Efficacy Objective
objectives.text: To evaluate the efficacy of Drug X compared to placebo

objectives.name: Key Secondary Objective
objectives.text: To characterize the overall survival benefit

objectives.name: Safety Objective
objectives.text: To evaluate safety and tolerability of PDR001 in combination with dabrafenib and trametinib

objectives.name: Biomarker Objective
objectives.text: To identify and characterize potential resistance mechanism

endpoints.name: Safety Endpoint
endpoints.text: Incidence and severity of adverse events (AEs) and treatment related AEs (TRAEs)

endpoints.name: Exploratory Biomarker Endpoint
endpoints.text: Mandatory blood and optional tissue sample collection at the time of progression

estimands.name: Primary Efficacy Estimand - PFS
estimands.populationSummary: Adult patients with untreated BRAF V600 mutant melanoma (Full Analysis Set/ITT) Summary measure: Hazard Ratio (HR) from a stratified Cox proportional hazards model.

intercurrentEvents.name: Treatment discontinuation
intercurrentEvents.text: Discontinuation of study treatment for any reason other than disease progression or death

intercurrentEvents.name: COVID-19 related disruption
intercurrentEvents.text: Delays in treatment or virtual visits due to the COVID-19 pandemic

estimands.treatment: PDR001 in combination with dabrafenib and trametinib vs Placebo in combination with dabrafenib and trametinib
estimands.analysisPopulation: Adult patients with untreated BRAF V600 mutant melanoma (Full Analysis Set/ITT)
estimands.variableOfInterest: Progression-Free Survival (PFS) based on investigator assessment per RECIST 1.1
estimands.summaryMeasure: Hazard Ratio (HR) from a stratified Cox proportional hazards model

estimands.name: Key Secondary Estimand - OS
estimands.populationSummary: Adult patients with untreated BRAF V600 mutant melanoma (Full Analysis Set/ITT) Summary measure: Hazard Ratio (HR).

intercurrentEvents.name: Treatment switching/Unblinding
intercurrentEvents.text: Mandatory unblinding and discontinuation of placebo following final PFS analysis

estimands.treatment: PDR001 in combination with dabrafenib and trametinib vs Placebo in combination with dabrafenib and trametinib
estimands.analysisPopulation: Adult patients with untreated BRAF V600 mutant melanoma (Full Analysis Set/ITT)

estimands.name: Safety Estimand
estimands.populationSummary: All patients who received at least one dose of study treatment (Safety Set) Summary measure: Risk difference or frequency proportions.

intercurrentEvents.name: Treatment discontinuation
intercurrentEvents.text: Discontinuation of any or all three drugs due to AEs

estimands.treatment: PDR001 in combination with dabrafenib and trametinib vs Placebo in combination with dabrafenib and trametinib
estimands.analysisPopulation: All patients who received at least one dose of study treatment (Safety Set)
estimands.variableOfInterest: Incidence and severity of adverse events (AEs) and treatment related AEs (TRAEs)
